code: import{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var intervalId;function Slide(images){var i=0;intervalId=setInterval(()=>{document.getElementById(images[i].id).classList.remove('active');document.getElementById(images[i].id).classList.remove('d-flex');i++;if(i===images.length)i=0;document.getElementById(images[i].id).classList.add('active');document.getElementById(images[i].id).classList.add('d-flex');},5000);}export default function Carousel(props){const{images}=props;useEffect(()=>{Slide(images);document.getElementById(images[0].id).classList.add('active');document.getElementById(images[0].id).classList.add('d-flex');return()=>{clearInterval(intervalId);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-inner rounded",children:images.map(img=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-item",id:img.id,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img.images,alt:"...",style:{height:500,width:"100%"}})},img.id);})})})});}
